title: Rachel Bloom | A Closer Look: Matt Lauer Sexual Harassment Allegations; Trump's Unhinged Tweets
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how the national reckoning over sexual harassment continued yesterday with the firing of TODAY show host Matt Lauer and how President Trump is becoming increasingly unmoored from reality.

Then, Rachel Bloom talks about her show Crazy Ex-Girlfriend with Seth. She also takes a few more questions from Late Night producer Henry Melcher backstage.
